rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The N.C. Department of Agriculture & Consumer Services said in a news release that the flock of 32,100 birds at the operation in Johnston County was killed and was being composted to guard against spread of the avian flu.
